isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - long sleeper b-pillar SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: long sleeper b-pillar SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove B-Pillar Side Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 76 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Items 4 and 5), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side B-pillar side trim panel (Item 6) from sleeper cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 76. Passenger Side B-pillar Side Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. PASSENGER SIDE B-PILLAR SIDE TRIM PANEL
7. PASSENGER SIDE MIDDLE SIDE TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side B-pillar side trim panel on sleeper cab.
